definition[0]: when you judge your own work or progress
definition[1]: when someone who works for themselves calculates how much tax they should pay
definition[2]: a tax system in which people present information on how much they have earned and calculate for themselves how much tax they have to pay in a particular year
example[0]: For self-assessment to work, the tax has to be simple enough for taxpayers to be able to fill in their own tax returns.
